hero.title: Discover the NCI Data Sharing Lifecycle
hero.subtitle: NCI's Data Sharing Approach Starts and Ends with the Patient in Mind

mission.title: NCI Office of Data Sharing (ODS) Mission:
mission.description: To direct a comprehensive data sharing vision and strategy for NCI which advocates for proper broad and equitable data sharing and the needs of the cancer research and patient communities.

banner.supportTitle: NCI ODS Supports Broad Data Sharing in 3 Ways
banner.questionText: Have a question about how to share your NCI-funded research?
textFrame: Advise on programs that define impactful data and resources
Implement guidance that promote broad access and use of data
Offer tools and processes that help ensure data are Findable, Accessible, Interoperable, and Reusable (FAIR).

updates.title: Temporary Delay in dbGaP Data Access and Submission Requests
updates.description: We apologize for any temporary delays in processing NCI data requests due to the recent federal government closure. We appreciate your patience as we work to restore normal operations as quickly as possible.

updates.title: ODS Webinar: Cancer Data Sharing in Action - 12/10/25 1-2:30PM ET
updates.description: ODS Symposium highlights: Resources, examples, and the far-reaching impact of data sharing and reuse.

updates.title: 2024 NIH Public Access Policy: New Effective Date
updates.description: The NIH Public Access Policy is effective July 1, 2025, allowing researchers and the public to have speedier access to NIH-supported findings.
